official_title: A bill to repeal section 1725 of title 18, United States Code, which prohibits mailable matter on which no postage has been paid from being deposited into letter boxes.

summary.text: Amends the Federal criminal code to repeal the provision which prohibits the deposit of mailable matter on which no postage has been paid into letter boxes.

titles.title: A bill to repeal section 1725 of title 18, United States Code, which prohibits mailable matter on which no postage has been paid from being deposited into letter boxes.
